March 29, 2025 - Nutter Butter is an American sandwich cookie brand, first introduced in 1969 and currently owned by Nabisco, which is a subsidiary of Mondelez International. It is claimed to be the best-selling American peanut butter sandwich cookie, with around a billion estimated to be eaten every year.

t: Nutter Butter's Origin Remains a Mystery in Spite of Its Decades of Staying Power

t: Nutter Butter’s 5 Takeaways from 2 Years of Being Weird on Social
s: 2 weeks ago - As marketers, “we all are following the same trends,” said Tony Wood, vp and head of marketing strategy for Dentsu Creative, “and that’s leading to a sea of sameness.” So say what you will about Nutter Butter’s disquieting content—but no other cookie brand is doing it.
